error.message: Class Drupal\scheduled_message\Event\ScheduledMessageEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
Call to deprecated function render(). Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Render\RendererInterface::render() instead.
Missing explicit access check on entity query.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8.4 || ^9.0 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8.4 || ^9.0 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
